Name: Tiradito
Description: Made with thinly sliced, raw fish, veggies, and drizzles with lemon and lime juices.

DescriptionLocalization.ko: 얇게 썬 생선, 야채, 레몬과 라임 주스를 곁들인 음식.
DescriptionLocalization.fr: Fait de tranches de poisson cru très fines et de légumes arrosés de jus de citron et de lime.
DescriptionLocalization.ja: 薄くスライスした生魚にレモンとライムのソースと香味野菜をトッピングしたもの。
DescriptionLocalization.pt: Feito com peixes finos fatiados, crus, legumes e gotas de sucos de limão.
DescriptionLocalization.tr: İnce dilimlenmiş çiğ balık, sebzeler,limon ve misket limonu sulu sosla yapılmış.
